input.sentences: my great grandfather is a hoarder .
i went over to help him clean .
most of the clutter was cleared out .
output.sentences: He lived in a very small and dirty apartment.
His beautiful daughter arrived to tell him she found a better apartment to live in.
Grandpa packed up and took one last look down the hallway filled with other makeshift apartments.
All that had been left behind was an old abandoned pillow.
